  • Constructor Details

    • View

      public View​(javafx.stage.Stage stage, Controller controller)
      Constructor for View. Initializes the stage and scenes and the controller to detect input on the View.
      Parameters:
      stage - the stage which the scenes are placed on
      controller - the controller that takes user inputs and controls the View based on them

      Returns:

    • createImage

      public static javafx.scene.image.Image createImage​(java.lang.String pathToFile, int width, int height, boolean ratio, boolean smooth)
      Creates an image with set dimensions
      Parameters:
      pathToFile - the String containing the file path to the image
      width - the width of the image
      height - the height of the image
      ratio - the boolean indicating whether to preserve the image ratio
      smooth - the boolean indicating whether to use a better quality filtering algorithm or a faster one when scaling the image
      Returns:
      the created image

    • generateMap

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView generateMap​(java.util.Collection<GardenObject> someObjects)
      Draws the map out for the user to see
      Parameters:
      someObjects - a collection of garden objects which make up the map
      Returns:
      an ImageView of the map so the user can see the map

    • generateImage

      public javafx.scene.paint.Paint generateImage​(javafx.scene.image.Image image, Season season)
      Finds the correct image for a plant
      Parameters:
      plantName - the plant that will be shown in the image
      year - the amount of years after the plant has been planted
      season - the season in which the plant is shown
      Returns:
      an ImageView of the plant
